description:
Login to the websiste using the following credentialss
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Go to shoes category and click on the first product that shows up.
Verify that user is directed to a product detail view page that has the following information: 
- Product image
- Product name (productDisplayName)
- Color information (baseColour)
- Price in USD
- Add to Cart button

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the login page at http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' in the login form, and click login.
Navigate to the shoes category page
Click on the first product displayed in the shoes category
Verify the product detail view page displays the product image
Verify the product detail view page displays the product name
Verify the product detail view page displays the color information
Verify the product detail view page displays the price in USD
Verify that there is Add to Cart button on the PDP page.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, navigate to shoes, verify details

description:
Login to the websiste using the following credentialss
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Go to shoes category and click on the first product that shows up.
Verify that user is directed to a product detail view page. 
Go back to the previous page and verify that we are back in shoes category page.
Now select the second product and verify that user can navigate again to the PDP page.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter the username 'test_user_name' in the username field
Enter the password 'test_password' in the password field
Click the login button to authenticate
Navigate to the shoes category page from the homepage
Click on the first product displayed in the shoes category
Verify that the user is directed to the product detail view (PDP) page for the selected product
Click the browser's back button to return to the shoes category page
Verify that the shoes category page is displayed after navigating back
Click on the second product in the shoes category
Verify that the user navigates to the PDP page for the second product
Take a screenshot of the completed task to ensure the test was successful

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, navigate shoes category, verify PDP navigation

description:
Navigate to the website http://localhost:3005/product/99999

and login using following credentials if required. 
username: test_user_name
password: test_password


And users gets a appropriate message that the product doesn't exists.
Verify that user can click on the logo to navigate to home.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to URL: http://localhost:3005/product/99999
if on login page, enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' into the respective login fields, and click login.
Wait for the product detail page to load and verify that an appropriate error message is displayed indicating the product does not exist.
Locate the 'THE STORE' logo on the page.
Click on the logo to navigate back to the home page.
Wait for the home page to load and verify successful navigation by checking key elements (e.g., the 'Just In' section or home title).

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, verify missing product error and navigate home
